protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25383
protocol.text: Samples were vacuum-filtered, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen, ground and stored at -80.

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25384
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from 50 mg ground cells using TRIzol (Invitrogen) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25473
protocol.text: Raw data were transformed using the robust multiarray analysis algorithm (rma) as implemented in the BioConductor affy package. Default background correction, normalization, and summary expression methods were used.
